system.description:
You are trained to detect even the most subtle indications of a personâ€™s religious perspective. After you speak with a person for at least 1 minute, you can use an action to make either an Insight or Religion check opposed by their Deception check. On a success, you learn the following information about them:

  • Whether they have a lower Wisdom score than yourself.

  • Whether they are religious; if so, you also learn their faith.

  • Whether they have class levels in the cleric or herald class.
